pageTitle: Itinerary for December 3 to 4, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, December 3, 2017:

All times local.

Beijing, China

7:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Beijing, China.

VIP Terminal
Beijing Capital International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity upon arrival

Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, December 4, 2017:

9 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an event promoting Canada-China tourism at the Sina Weibo Headquarters with the Minister of Small Business and Tourism, Bardish Chagger. He will deliver remarks and participate in an armchair discussion.

Atrium, Ground Floor
No. 8 Sina Plaza, Courtyard 10, The West
Xibeiwang E.R., Haidian District

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an official welcoming ceremony.

North Hall, 1st floor
Great Hall of the People

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of the People’s Republic of China, Li Keqiang.

East Hall, 1st floor
Great Hall of the People

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a signing ceremony.

Hebei Room, 1st floor
Great Hall of the People

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

6 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Premier of the People’s Republic of China.

Taiwan Room, 1st floor
Great Hall of the People

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a dinner given by the Premier of the People’s Republic of China.

Golden Hall, 3rd floor
Great Hall of the People

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only
